p:
The molecular identification of endophytic fungal isolate (DSE 72) was done by National Fungal Culture Collection of India (NFCCI), Agharkar Research Institute, Pune, India; it was identified as Chaetomium globosum. The sequence obtained was deposited in Genbank under the accession number (MN416318). This fungus has been reported to possess a good antimicrobial activity in our previous study
15 .
